properties.description: Updates the Broadshield tables that store the history and changes from the API using files taken from previous Days. Data from the json files is inserted into staging tables, then compared to the history tables. When there is a change the record is inserted into history table. source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT
	Allocations.[AL_DET_REF]
	,Allocations.[AL_ACCOUNT] AS AccNo
	,Allocations.[AL_CREDATT] AS CreatedAt
	,Allocations.[AL_DATE] AS TransactionDate
	,Allocations.[AL_PAYDAY] AS DateAllocated
	,Allocations.[AL_PAYIND]
	,Allocations.[AL_POSTREF] AS POST_REF
	,Allocations.[AL_REF1] AS Reference1
	,Allocations.[AL_REF2] AS Reference2
	,Allocations.[AL_TYPE] 
	,CASE 
		WHEN Allocations.[AL_TYPE] = 'A' THEN 'Adjustment - System'
		WHEN Allocations.[AL_TYPE] = 'C' THEN 'Credit'
		WHEN Allocations.[AL_TYPE] = 'I' THEN 'Invoice'
		WHEN Allocations.[AL_TYPE] = 'J' THEN 'Adjustment - User'
		WHEN Allocations.[AL_TYPE] = 'R' THEN 'Receipt'
		WHEN Allocations.[AL_TYPE] = 'N' THEN 'Adjustment - System'
		ELSE ''
	END AS TransactionType
	,Allocations.[AL_VAL] AS AllocationValue
	,Allocations.[MEMO] AS AllocationMemo
FROM 
	InvAlloc AS Allocations WITH (NOLOCK)

SELECT	 
	Nominal_Code.AltAccount AS AnalysisCode, 
	Nominal_Code.Description AS AnalysisDescription, 
	Nominal_Code.Account
FROM		 
	Nominal_Code (NOLOCK) 
WHERE	 
	Nominal_Code.RecType = 'Elephant' 
	AND Nominal_Code.UseFlag <> 'X' 
	AND Nominal_Code.AltAccount != ''
	AND (SiteFilter = 0 OR Noml_Ref IN (SELECT LinkKey FROM Site_Join (NOLOCK) WHERE upper(LinkTable) = 'NOMINAL_CODE' AND Site_Ref = 151)) ORDER BY Nominal_Code.Account

SELECT 
    Site.SiteId
	,Site.SiteName
	,Profiles.Pro_code AS profile_code
    ,Profiles.Prodesc AS profile_description
    ,Chsysdec.Description AS account_type
    ,Profiles.Pro_ref
    ,Profiles.Billdays AS bill_days_or_nights
    ,Profiles.Billdeath AS bill_day_of_death
    ,Profiles.Billdod AS bill_day_of_discharge
    ,Profiles.Billdoa AS bill_day_of_admission
    ,Profiles.Invprint
    ,Profiles.Invdoc
    ,Profiles.Soflag AS standing_order
    ,Profiles.Noticeper AS notice_period
    ,Profiles.Nperanal AS notice_period_analysis_code
    ,Profiles.Npervatr AS notice_period_vat_code
    ,Profiles.Defrate AS default_charge_rate
    ,Profiles.Chgper AS charge_period
    ,Profiles.Feesanal AS analysis_code
    ,Profiles.Feesdesc AS fees_description
    ,Profiles.FeesVatC AS vat_code
    ,Profiles.BillAbs AS bill_while_temp_absent
    ,Profiles.Autocredit AS automatic_credit
    ,Profiles.PenBooks AS attach_pension_books
    ,Profiles.UserMemo
    ,Profiles.NoInvDec
    ,Profiles.sg_BankAcc
    ,Profiles.UseFlag
    ,Profiles.OOSExtraContrib

FROM 
	Profiles (NOLOCK)

    JOIN Chsysdec (NOLOCK) -- Lookup table for values?
        ON Chsysdec.Decode_Ref = Profiles.FsType

    JOIN Site (NOLOCK)
        ON Site.Site_Ref IN (
                                SELECT Site_Ref
                                FROM Site_Join (NOLOCK)
                                WHERE Site_Join.LinkKey = Profiles.Pro_Ref
                                      AND upper(Site_Join.LinkTable) = 'PROFILES'
                            )
           OR Profiles.SiteFilter = 0
WHERE 
	Profiles.FSTYPE = 401 --Local Auth
	--AND Site.SITEID IN (
	--071,
--072,
--073,
--074,
--075,
--078,
--079,
--086,
--089,
--088,
--091,
--092,
--090,
--095,
--096,
--097,
--098,
--099,
--100,
--101,
--102,
--103,
--104,
--105,
--106,
--107,
--108,
--109,
--110,
--111,
--112,
--113,
--114,
--115,
--116,
--117,
--118,
--119,
--120,
--121,
--122,
--123,
--127,
--128
--)

SELECT 
    H.Home_Ref
    --,P.SiteId
    ,SiteName
    ,profile_code
    ,profile_description
    ,account_type
    ,Pro_ref
    ,bill_days_or_nights
    ,bill_day_of_death
    ,bill_day_of_discharge
    ,bill_day_of_admission
    --,Invprint
    --,Invdoc
    ,standing_order
    ,notice_period
    ,notice_period_analysis_code
    ,notice_period_vat_code
    ,default_charge_rate
    ,charge_period
    ,analysis_code
    ,fees_description
    ,vat_code
    ,bill_while_temp_absent
    ,automatic_credit
    ,attach_pension_books
    --,UserMemo
    --,NoInvDec
    ,sg_BankAcc
    --,UseFlag
    --,OOSExtraContrib
FROM 
    dbo.LocalAuthProfiles AS P

    LEFT JOIN ColdHarbourHomeID AS H
        ON H.SITEID = P.SiteId

SELECT
	DIRECTD_DT.DDDT_REF,
	DirectD_Hd.DDHD_REF,
	FundSrc_Hd.AccNo,
    Resident.Res_Code,
	DirectD_DT.INVOICE_NO AS InvoiceNo,
    DirectD_Dt.DDTranType AS DDTypeID,
	CASE 
		WHEN DirectD_Dt.DDTranType = 1 THEN 'New DD'
		WHEN DirectD_Dt.DDTranType = 17 THEN 'Standard DD'
		WHEN DirectD_Dt.DDTranType = 18 THEN 'Cancel DD'
		WHEN DirectD_Dt.DDTranType = 19 THEN 'Change of value'
		ELSE ''
	END AS DDTranType,
    DirectD_Dt.Amount AS DDAmount,
    isnull(DirectD_Dt.Due_Date, DirectD_Dt.Inv_Date) AS DueDate,
    DirectD_Dt.Submitted AS SubmittedDate,
    DirectD_Dt.Allocated AS AllocationStatus,
    DirectD_Hd.BatchNo,
	S.SITEID
FROM 
	DirectD_Dt (NOLOCK)
    
    JOIN DirectD_Hd (NOLOCK)
        ON DirectD_Hd.DDHd_Ref = DirectD_Dt.DDHd_Ref

    JOIN FundSrc_Hd (NOLOCK)
		ON FundSrc_Hd.FS_Ref = DirectD_Dt.FS_Ref

	JOIN Resident (NOLOCK)
		ON Resident.Res_Ref = FundSrc_Hd.Res_Ref
		
	JOIN Site AS S(NOLOCK)
        ON S.Site_Ref = DIRECTD_HD.Site_Ref

SELECT
    DD.[SITEID]
    ,H.HOME_REF
    ,H.HomeName
    ,DD.DDDT_REF
    ,DD.[DDHD_REF]
    ,DD.[AccNo]
    ,DD.[RES_CODE]
    ,DD.[InvoiceNo]
    ,DD.[DDTypeID]
    ,DD.[DDTranType]
    ,DD.[DDAmount]
    ,DD.[DueDate]
    ,DD.[SubmittedDate]
    ,DD.[AllocationStatus]
    ,DD.[BatchNo]
FROM 
    ColdHarbour.STGDirectDebits AS DD

    LEFT JOIN GRG.HOME AS H
        ON H.SiteID = DD.SiteID

properties.description: Copies the posted transactions from On Prem CH to Transform

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT 
	InvPosting.POST_REF,
	Site.SiteId AS siteid,
	Site.SiteName as sitename, 
	P.PRODESC AS AccProfile,
	CONCAT(RTRIM(CONTACT.FORENAMES), RTRIM(CONTACT.SURNAME)) AS FundSourceName,
	InvPosting.account_No AS AccNo, 
	R.RES_CODE AS RES_CODE,
	InvPosting.CRE_DATET AS CreatedAt,
	InvPosting.DUE_DATE AS DueDate,
	InvPosting.INV_DATE AS TransactionDate,
	CASE 
		WHEN InvPosting.Tran_Type = 'U' THEN 'Receipt - To account'
		WHEN InvPosting.Tran_Type = 'I' THEN 'Invoice'
		WHEN InvPosting.Tran_Type = 'C' THEN 'Credit'
		WHEN InvPosting.Tran_Type = 'J' THEN 'Adjustment'
		WHEN InvPosting.Tran_Type = 'R' THEN 'Receipt - To transaction'
		WHEN InvPosting.Tran_Type = 'N' THEN 'System Receipt'
		ELSE ''
	END AS TransactionType,
	InvPosting.Ref1 AS Reference1, 
	InvPosting.Ref2 AS Reference2, 
	InvPosting.Value AS TransactionValue, 
	InvPosting.Balance AS TransactionBalance
	,INVPOSTING.TRAN_TYPE
	,INVPOSTING.AN_CODE1 AS AnalysisCode
	,INVPOSTING.USERCOMM AS UserComment
FROM 
	InvPosting WITH (NOLOCK)
	
	LEFT JOIN FUNDSRC_HD AS ACC WITH (NOLOCK)
		ON ACC.ACCNO = InvPosting.ACCOUNT_NO
		AND ACC.ENDDATE IS NULL

	LEFT JOIN CONTACT_HD AS CONTACT WITH (NOLOCK) 
		ON CONTACT.CONTACT_REF = ACC.CNTA_DET_REF

	LEFT JOIN PROFILES AS P WITH (NOLOCK)
		ON P.PRO_REF = ACC.PRO_REF

	LEFT JOIN RESIDENT AS R WITH (NOLOCK)
		ON R.RES_REF = INVPOSTING.RES_REF

	LEFT JOIN Site WITH (NOLOCK)
		ON Site.Site_Ref = InvPosting.Site_Ref

SELECT
    STGPostedTransactions.POST_REF
    ,STGPostedTransactions.SiteID
    ,HOME.HOME_REF
    ,STGPostedTransactions.SiteName
    ,STGPostedTransactions.AccProfile
    ,STGPostedTransactions.FundSourceName
    ,STGPostedTransactions.AccNo
    ,STGPostedTransactions.RES_CODE
    ,STGPostedTransactions.CreatedAt
    ,STGPostedTransactions.DueDate
    ,STGPostedTransactions.TransactionDate
    ,STGPostedTransactions.TransactionType
    ,STGPostedTransactions.Reference1
    ,STGPostedTransactions.Reference2
    ,STGPostedTransactions.TransactionValue
    ,STGPostedTransactions.TransactionBalance
    ,STGPostedTransactions.AnalysisCode
    ,STGPostedTransactions.UserComment
FROM 
    ColdHarbour.STGPostedTransactions

    LEFT JOIN GRG.HOME
        ON HOME.SiteID = STGPostedTransactions.SiteID

SELECT
    stgtblEmpJobs.JobAutoId,
    stgtblEmpJobs.EmployeeID,
    stgtblEmpJobs.ContractedHours,
    stgtblEmpJobs.Department,
    stgtblEmpJobs.Role,
    stgtblEmpJobs.JobNo,
    DATEADD(s, StartDate, '1970-01-01 00:00:00') AS StartDate,
    stgtblEmpJobs.Holidays,
    stgtblEmpJobs.HolidayFull,
    stgtblEmpJobs.SentToUnit,
    stgtblEmpJobs.BreakRule,
    stgtblEmpJobs.ContractID,
    stgtblEmpJobs.Deleted,
    DATEADD(s, StartDate, '1970-01-01 00:00:00') AS LastUpdate,
    stgtblEmpJobs.WorkingArrangements,
    stgtblEmpJobs.VHEnabled,
    stgtblEmpJobs.VHBalance,
    NULL AS VHBalanceDate,
    stgtblEmpJobs.SicknessThreshold,
    stgtblEmpJobs.SourceFileName
FROM 
    CareBlox.STGtblEmpJobs

SELECT 
    EmployeeAutoID,
    EmployeeID,
    Title,
    Forename,
    Middlename,
    Surname,
    LocationID,
    AddressLine1,
    AddressLine2,
    AddressLine3,
    AddressLine4,
    AddressLine5,
    PostCode,
    Country,
    Telephone,
    Mobile,
    Email,
    CASE 
        WHEN BirthDate < 0 THEN DATEADD(DAY, -(ABS(BirthDate) / 86400), '1970-01-01') --Convert EPOCH number to a positive with ABS(). Divide by 86400 seconds in a day. Subtract this from 1970-01-01
        ELSE DATEADD(s, BirthDate, '1970-01-01 00:00:00') 
    END AS BirthDate,
    CountryOfBirth,
    YearOfEntry,
    DATEADD(s, DateStarted, '1970-01-01 00:00:00') AS DateStarted,
    DATEADD(s, LeavingDate, '1970-01-01 00:00:00') AS LeavingDate,
    LeavingEnteredBy,
    DATEADD(s, LeavingEnteredOn, '1970-01-01 00:00:00') AS LeavingEnteredOn,
    Gender,
    NINumber,
    EthnicOrigin,
    Religion,
    Disability,
    Nationality,
    Dependants,
    AccountNumber,
    AccountName,
    SortCode,
    BankName,
    BankBranch,
    BuildingSocRef,
    MaritalStatus,
    PayMethod,
    UploadAsNewStarter,
    NeedsUploading,
    HasLeft,
    PackageID,
    ImportPackageID,
    ContractedHours,
    DefaultPayRate,
    LeavingReason,
    LeavingDestination,
    IncludeInNextPay,
    OnSick,
    Export,
    SageID,
    TATagID,
    BankStaff,
    PostCodeSearch,
    WorkingTimeWaiver,
    SentToUnit,
    BatchID,
    EmployeeType,
    HolidayMonthStart,
    CreatedByID,
    CreatedByName,
    DATEADD(s, CreatedDate, '1970-01-01 00:00:00') AS CreatedDate,
    ShortDisplayName,
    DisplayColour,
    ApproverName,
    ApproverID,
    IsApprover,
    TAApprover,
    RosterUnitList,
    PrimaryRosterUnit,
    PortalEnabled,
    PortalPassword,
    NoticePeriod,
    DATEADD(s, DataUpgradedDate, '1970-01-01 00:00:00') AS DataUpgradedDate,
    DataUpgradedBy,
    SourceFileName
  FROM 
    CareBlox.STGtblEmployees

SELECT
    PayrollID,
    EmployeeID,
    EmployeeName,
    LocationID,
    RoleID,
    Role,
    TypeID,
    Type,
    Rate,
    Units,
    Comment,
    DATEADD(s, EnteredDate, '1970-01-01 00:00:00') AS EnteredDate,
    EnteredBy,
    EnteredByName,
    PeriodNo,
    HasVariance,
    MonthSplit,
    Comitted,
    DATEADD(s, ApprovedDate, '1970-01-01 00:00:00') AS ApprovedDate,
    ApprovedBy,
    ApprovedByName,
    ImportedFromTA,
    WorkedLocationID,
    BatchID,
    DATEADD(s, ItemDate, '1970-01-01 00:00:00') AS ItemDate,
    SourceFileName
FROM 
    CareBlox.STGtblPayrollData

SELECT 
    PeriodID,
    CurrentPeriodNum,
    DATEADD(s, DateCreated, '1970-01-01 00:00:00') AS DateCreated,
    LocationID,
    DateRange,
    GeneratedPayroll,
    CONCAT(SUBSTRING(DateRange, 7, 4), '-', SUBSTRING(DateRange, 4, 2), '-', SUBSTRING(DateRange, 1, 2)) AS FromDate,
    CONCAT(SUBSTRING(DateRange, 20, 4), '-', SUBSTRING(DateRange, 17, 2), '-', SUBSTRING(DateRange, 14, 2)) AS ToDate,
    SourceFileName
FROM 
    CareBlox.STGtblPeriods

SELECT 
    RatesAutoID,
    EmployeeID,
    RoleID,
    TypeID,
    Rate,
    IsDefault,

properties.description: Exports the DD report for the 3 homes that bank with Barclays. Saves to container which is monitored by a logic app, which will save to share point.

sqlReaderQuery.value:
WITH DirectDebitData AS (
	SELECT 
		CONCAT(RTRIM(Contact_Hd_Res.Forenames), ' ', RTRIM(Contact_Hd_Res.Surname)) AS [Debtor Name],
		REPLACE(CASE
			WHEN DirectD_Dt.BkSortCode != '' THEN
				DirectD_Dt.BkSortCode
			ELSE
				isnull(Contact_Hd_FS.BkSortCode, space(8))
		END, '-', '') AS [Debtor Sort Code],
		CASE
			WHEN DirectD_Dt.BankAcc != '' THEN
				RTRIM(DirectD_Dt.BankAcc)
			ELSE
				RTRIM(FundSrc_Hd.BankAcc)
		END AS [Debtor Account Number],
		RTRIM(Resident.Res_Code) AS [Collection Details],
		DirectD_Dt.Amount,
		CAST(DirectD_Dt.Amount AS NUMERIC(18, 2)) AS [Debtor Amount],
		CASE 
			WHEN DirectD_Dt.DDTranType = '17' THEN '17 - Standard Ongoing Collection'
			WHEN DirectD_Dt.DDTranType = '01' THEN '01 - First Collection'
			WHEN DirectD_Dt.DDTranType = '18' THEN '18 - '
			WHEN DirectD_Dt.DDTranType = '19' THEN '19 - '
			ELSE DirectD_Dt.DDTranType
		END AS [Transaction Type],

		DirectD_Dt.DDHd_Ref,
		DirectD_Dt.DDDT_REF,
		DirectD_Dt.DUE_DATE
	FROM 
		DirectD_Dt (NOLOCK)
		JOIN DirectD_Hd (NOLOCK)
			ON DirectD_Hd.DDHd_Ref = DirectD_Dt.DDHd_Ref
			   AND DirectD_Hd.BatchNo
			   BETWEEN 0 AND 9999999999
		JOIN FundSrc_Hd (NOLOCK)
			LEFT JOIN Contact_Dt AS Contact_Dt_FS (NOLOCK)
				JOIN Contact_Hd AS Contact_Hd_FS (NOLOCK)
					ON Contact_Hd_FS.Contact_Ref = Contact_Dt_FS.Contact_Ref
				ON Contact_Dt_FS.Cnta_Det_Ref = FundSrc_Hd.Bank_Det_Ref
			JOIN Resident (NOLOCK)
				JOIN Contact_Dt AS Contact_Dt_Res (NOLOCK)
					JOIN Contact_Hd AS Contact_Hd_Res (NOLOCK)
						ON Contact_Hd_Res.Contact_Ref = Contact_Dt_Res.Contact_Ref
					ON Contact_Dt_Res.Cnta_Det_Ref = Resident.Cnta_Det_Ref
				JOIN Room_Dt (NOLOCK)
					JOIN Locations (NOLOCK)
						JOIN Site (NOLOCK)
							ON Site.Site_Ref = Locations.Site_Ref
						ON Locations.Loc_Ref = Room_Dt.Loc_Ref
					ON Room_Dt.Room_Ref = Resident.Room_Ref
				ON Resident.Res_Ref = FundSrc_Hd.Res_Ref
			ON FundSrc_Hd.FS_Ref = DirectD_Dt.FS_Ref
	WHERE 
		DirectD_Dt.Due_Date
		BETWEEN '17530101' AND '29991231'
		AND DirectD_Dt.Allocated != 'X'
		and DirectD_Dt.Submitted IS NULL
		and DirectD_Dt.DDTranType IN ( '01', '17', '18', '19' )
		AND Locations.Site_Ref = @{item().Site_ref}
)
SELECT 
	DirectDebitData.[Debtor Name],
	DirectDebitData.[Debtor Sort Code],
	DirectDebitData.[Debtor Account Number],
	DirectDebitData.[Collection Details],
	SUM(DirectDebitData.[Debtor Amount]) AS [Debtor Amount],
	DirectDebitData.[Transaction Type]

	--,DirectDebitData.DUE_DATE
FROM
	DirectDebitData
--WHERE
--	DirectDebitData.[Collection Details] = 'MM0182'
GROUP BY
	DirectDebitData.DDHd_Ref,
	DirectDebitData.DUE_DATE,
	DirectDebitData.[Debtor Name],
	DirectDebitData.[Debtor Sort Code],
	DirectDebitData.[Debtor Account Number],
	DirectDebitData.[Collection Details],
	DirectDebitData.[Transaction Type]

source.sqlReaderQuery:
WITH BudgetData AS(
SELECT 
    H.IntranetID,
    S.BudgetType,
    S.ExchCode,
    S.GLCode,
    S.GLDesc,
    P.BudgetDate,
    S.YearEnd,
    TRY_CAST(P.Amount AS NUMERIC(18,5)) AS BudgetAmount
FROM 
    Exchequer.STGBudgets AS S

    LEFT JOIN Avery.HomeDetails H
        ON H.ExchCode = S.ExchCode

    CROSS APPLY (VALUES
        (S.Period1Date, S.Period1Value),
        (S.Period2Date, S.Period2Value),
        (S.Period3Date, S.Period3Value),
        (S.Period4Date, S.Period4Value),
        (S.Period5Date, S.Period5Value),
        (S.Period6Date, S.Period6Value),
        (S.Period7Date, S.Period7Value),
        (S.Period8Date, S.Period8Value),
        (S.Period9Date, S.Period9Value),
        (S.Period10Date, S.Period10Value),
        (S.Period11Date, S.Period11Value),
        (S.Period12Date, S.Period12Value)
    ) AS P(BudgetDate, Amount)

WHERE 
    S.ExchCode IS NOT NULL
    AND P.BudgetDate IS NOT NULL
)

SELECT 
    CAST(
        CAST(BudgetData.IntranetID AS VARCHAR(4)) + 
        CAST(BudgetData.BudgetType AS VARCHAR(1)) +
        CAST(BudgetData.GLCode AS VARCHAR(6)) + 
        CONVERT(VARCHAR(8), CAST(BudgetData.BudgetDate AS DATE), 112) 
    AS BIGINT) AS BudgetCompositeKey,
    *
FROM
    BudgetData
ORDER BY
    IntranetID ASC,
    GLCode ASC,
    BudgetDate ASC,
    BudgetType ASC

SELECT
    Address1
    ,Address2
    ,Address3
    ,Address4
    ,AmendDateTime
    ,Cont_SubType
    ,Cont_SubTypeDec
    ,CreateDateTime
    ,Forenames
    ,GRGApp_GrGsRef
    ,GRGrep_Cnta_Det_Ref
    ,Gen_Comments
    ,PostCode
    ,RelType
    ,RelTypeDec
    ,Res_Ref
    ,Surname
    ,Tel_No1
    ,Tel_No2
    ,TitleDec
    ,oCnta_Det_Ref
    ,Email
    ,LASTUPDATE
FROM 
    dbo.RESCONTACTS
WHERE
    Res_Ref IN (SELECT ORES_REF FROM RESIDENT WHERE HOME_REF IN (@{variables('Home_Ref_List')}))

SELECT 
    ADANAL_DEC
    ,ADDRESS1
    ,ADDRESS2
    ,ADDRESS3
    ,ADDRESS4
    ,ADMSN_ANAL
    ,ADMSN_TYPE
    ,ADM_REASON
    ,ADTYP_DEC
    ,ANAL_GROUP
    ,AUTHORITY
    ,AmendDateTime
    ,BIRTHDATE
    ,CARECAT
    ,CONTSIGNED
    ,CreateDateTime
    ,DISABILITY
    ,ENQ_REF
    ,HOME
    ,HOME_REF
    ,LASTADDATE
    ,LASTDIDATE
    ,LOC_DESC
    ,LOC_REF
    ,MARKETING
    ,NINUMBER
    ,OCC_IGNORE
    ,ORES_REF
    ,ORIGADDATE
    ,POSTCODE
    ,RELIGION
    ,RESPAYINT
    ,RES_CODE
    --,RES_FNAME
	,CASE 
		WHEN CHARINDEX('&', RES_FNAME) > 0 THEN RES_FNAME
		WHEN CHARINDEX('-', RES_FNAME) > 0 THEN RES_FNAME
		ELSE (SUBSTRING(RES_FNAME, 1, CHARINDEX(' ', RES_FNAME + ' ')))
	END AS RES_FNAME
    ,RES_REF
    ,RES_SNAME
    ,ROOM
    ,ROOMCAT
    ,ROOM_DESC
    ,ROOM_TYPE
    ,SEX
    ,STATUS
    ,TEL_NO1
    ,TEL_NO2
    ,TITLE
    ,USERDEF
    ,AUTHCODE
    ,DOUBLEINS
    ,FIRSTAWARE
    ,FIRSTVISIT
    ,REAL_FNAME
    ,REAL_SNAME
    ,REAL_TITLE
    ,SIGIND
    ,THIRDPARTY
    ,USERFIELD1
    ,USERFIELD2
    ,USERFIELD3
    ,NHSNUMBER
    ,ALTCOMMS
    ,ALTCOMMS_REF
    ,ASS_ACTBY
    ,ASS_ACTBY_REF
    ,ASS_ACTDT
    ,CONNECTION
    ,CONNECTIONDET
    ,CONNECTION_REF
    ,FUNDERREF
    ,LANGUAGE
    ,LANGUAGE_REF
    ,MOVEDINFROM
    ,MOVEDINFROM_REF
    ,PATIENTREF
    ,PICID
    ,PREVCODE
	,CASE 
		WHEN CHARINDEX('"', RES_FNAME) > 0 THEN
			LTRIM(SUBSTRING(
				RES_FNAME, 
				CHARINDEX('"',RES_FNAME, 1) + 1,
				CHARINDEX('"', RES_FNAME, CHARINDEX('"', RES_FNAME) + 1) - CHARINDEX('"', RES_FNAME) - 1))
		WHEN CHARINDEX('(', RES_FNAME) > 0 THEN
			LTRIM(SUBSTRING(
				RES_FNAME, 
				CHARINDEX('(',RES_FNAME, 1) + 1,
				CHARINDEX(')', RES_FNAME, CHARINDEX('(', RES_FNAME) + 1) - CHARINDEX('(', RES_FNAME) - 1))
		WHEN CHARINDEX('''', RES_FNAME) > 0 THEN
			LTRIM(SUBSTRING(
				RES_FNAME, 
				CHARINDEX('''',RES_FNAME, 1) + 1,
				CHARINDEX('''', RES_FNAME, CHARINDEX('''', RES_FNAME) + 1) - CHARINDEX('''', RES_FNAME) - 1))
		ELSE ''
	END AS Preferred_Name
FROM 
    dbo.RESIDENT
WHERE
    HOME_REF IN (@{variables('Home_Ref_List')})

    AEMS.AEMS_Enquiries_Actions AS A

    INNER JOIN AEMS.AEMS_Enquiries AS E
        ON E.AEMS_ID = A.enquiry_id
        AND E.homeID = A.enquiry_homeID
    WHERE
        A.enquiry_homeID IN (@{variables('IntranetID')})

SELECT	 
	'@{variables('Home_Ref')}' AS HOME_REF,
	Site.SiteId AS siteid,
	Site.SiteName as sitename, 
	RESIDENT.RES_CODE as resident_no,
	InvPosting.account_No, 
	InvPosting.Cre_DateT AS created_date, 
	InvPosting.Inv_Date AS transaction_date,
	CASE 
		WHEN InvPosting.Tran_Type = 'U' THEN 'Receipt'
		WHEN InvPosting.Tran_Type = 'I' THEN 'Invoice'
		WHEN InvPosting.Tran_Type = 'C' THEN 'Credit'
		WHEN InvPosting.Tran_Type = 'J' THEN 'Adjustment'
		ELSE ''
	END AS transaction_type,
	InvPosting.Ref1 AS transaction_ref1, 
	InvPosting.Ref2 AS transaction_ref2, 
	InvPosting.Value AS transaction_value, 
	InvPosting.Balance AS transaction_balance, 
	Memo,
	USERCOMM AS UserComment
FROM		 
	InvPosting (NOLOCK) 
	
	JOIN Site (NOLOCK) 
		ON Site.Site_Ref = InvPosting.Site_Ref

	LEFT JOIN RESIDENT (NOLOCK)
		ON RESIDENT.RES_REF = INVPOSTING.RES_REF
WHERE	
	InvPosting.Site_Ref  = '@{item().SITE_REF}'

SELECT HOME_REF, HomeName, SITE_REF 
FROM ColdHarbourHomeID 
WHERE SITE_REF = '@{item().SITE_REF}'

SELECT SITE_REF FROM ColdHarbourHomeID WHERE 
HOME_REF IN (@{variables('Home_ref_List')})
SELECT HOME_REF, HomeName, IntranetID FROM ColdHarbourHomeID WHERE HOME_REF = '@{variables('Home_Ref')}'

SELECT
    R.ID,
    R.Assesment_Date,
    R.Status,
    R.Homename,
    R.Intranet,
    R.Res_No,
    --R.Res_First_Name,
    REPLACE(R.Res_First_Name, '"', '') AS Res_First_Name,
    R.Res_Surname,
    R.Unit,
    R.Room_No,
    R.Type,
    R.Total_Standard_Score AS Total_Service_Duration,

    Q1.Service_Description AS Service1_Description,
    r.Q1_Score AS Service1_Score,
    r.Q1_Standard_Score AS Service1_MinutesRequired,
    Q1.Support_Description AS Service1_SupportDescription,
    
    Q2.Service_Description AS Service2_Description,
    r.Q2_Score AS Service2_Score,
    r.Q2_Standard_Score AS Service2_MinutesRequired,
    Q2.Support_Description AS Service2_SupportDescription,

    Q3.Service_Description AS Service3_Description,
    r.Q3_Score AS Service3_Score,
    r.Q3_Standard_Score AS Service3_MinutesRequired,
    Q3.Support_Description AS Service3_SupportDescription,

    Q4.Service_Description AS Service4_Description,
    r.Q4_Score AS Service4_Score,
    r.Q4_Standard_Score AS Service4_MinutesRequired,
    Q4.Support_Description AS Service4_SupportDescription,

    Q5.Service_Description AS Service5_Description,
    r.Q5_Score AS Service5_Score,
    r.Q5_Standard_Score AS Service5_MinutesRequired,
    Q5.Support_Description AS Service5_SupportDescription,

    Q6.Service_Description AS Service6_Description,
    r.Q6_Score AS Service6_Score,
    r.Q6_Standard_Score AS Service6_MinutesRequired,
    Q6.Support_Description AS Service6_SupportDescription,

    Q7.Service_Description AS Service7_Description,
    r.Q7_Score AS Service7_Score,
    r.Q7_Standard_Score AS Service7_MinutesRequired,
    Q7.Support_Description AS Service7_SupportDescription,

    Q8.Service_Description AS Service8_Description,
    r.Q8_Score AS Service8_Score,
    r.Q8_Standard_Score AS Service8_MinutesRequired,
    Q8.Support_Description AS Service8_SupportDescription,

    Q9.Service_Description AS Service9_Description,
    r.Q9_Score AS Service9_Score,
    r.Q9_Standard_Score AS Service9_MinutesRequired,
    Q9.Support_Description AS Service9_SupportDescription,

    Q10.Service_Description AS Service10_Description,
    r.Q10_Score AS Service10_Score,
    r.Q10_Standard_Score AS Service10_MinutesRequired,
    Q10.Support_Description AS Service10_SupportDescription,

    Q11.Service_Description AS Service11_Description,
    r.Q11_Score AS Service11_Score,
    r.Q11_Standard_Score AS Service11_MinutesRequired,
    Q11.Support_Description AS Service11_SupportDescription,

    Q12.Service_Description AS Service12_Description,
    r.Q12_Score AS Service12_Score,
    r.Q12_Standard_Score AS Service12_MinutesRequired,
    Q12.Support_Description AS Service12_SupportDescription,

    Q13.Service_Description AS Service13_Description,
    r.Q13_Score AS Service13_Score,
    r.Q13_Standard_Score AS Service13_MinutesRequired,
    Q13.Support_Description AS Service13_SupportDescription
FROM 
    Dependency_Tool_Responses AS R

    LEFT JOIN Dependency_Tool AS Q1
        ON Q1.Support_Level = R.Q1_Score
        AND Q1.Service_Number = 1

    LEFT JOIN Dependency_Tool AS Q2
        ON Q2.Support_Level = R.Q2_Score
        AND Q2.Service_Number = 2

    LEFT JOIN Dependency_Tool AS Q3
        ON Q3.Support_Level = R.Q3_Score
        AND Q3.Service_Number = 3

    LEFT JOIN Dependency_Tool AS Q4
        ON Q4.Support_Level = R.Q4_Score
        AND Q4.Service_Number = 4

    LEFT JOIN Dependency_Tool AS Q5
        ON Q5.Support_Level = R.Q5_Score
        AND Q5.Service_Number = 5

    LEFT JOIN Dependency_Tool AS Q6
        ON Q6.Support_Level = R.Q6_Score
        AND Q6.Service_Number = 6

    LEFT JOIN Dependency_Tool AS Q7
        ON Q7.Support_Level = R.Q7_Score
        AND Q7.Service_Number = 7

    LEFT JOIN Dependency_Tool AS Q8
        ON Q8.Support_Level = R.Q8_Score
        AND Q8.Service_Number = 8

    LEFT JOIN Dependency_Tool AS Q9
        ON Q9.Support_Level = R.Q9_Score
        AND Q9.Service_Number = 9

    LEFT JOIN Dependency_Tool AS Q10
        ON Q10.Support_Level = R.Q10_Score
        AND Q10.Service_Number = 10

    LEFT JOIN Dependency_Tool AS Q11
        ON Q11.Support_Level = R.Q11_Score
        AND Q11.Service_Number = 11

    LEFT JOIN Dependency_Tool AS Q12
        ON Q12.Support_Level = R.Q12_Score
        AND Q12.Service_Number = 12

    LEFT JOIN Dependency_Tool AS Q13
        ON Q13.Support_Level = R.Q13_Score
        AND Q13.Service_Number = 13
WHERE 
    --R.Status = 'Active' 
    R.Intranet IN (@{variables('IntranetID')})
ORDER BY 
    Intranet ASC, 
    Assesment_Date ASC

FROM

WHERE

SELECT 
    ADANAL_DEC
    ,ADDRESS1
    ,ADDRESS2
    ,ADDRESS3
    ,ADDRESS4
    ,ADMSN_ANAL
    ,ADMSN_TYPE
    ,ADM_REASON
    ,ADTYP_DEC
    ,ANAL_GROUP
    ,AUTHORITY
    ,AmendDateTime
    ,BIRTHDATE
    ,CARECAT
    ,CONTSIGNED
    ,CreateDateTime
    ,DISABILITY
    ,ENQ_REF
    ,HOME
    ,HOME_REF
    ,LASTADDATE
    ,LASTDIDATE
    ,LOC_DESC
    ,LOC_REF
    ,MARKETING
    ,NINUMBER
    ,OCC_IGNORE
    ,ORES_REF
    ,ORIGADDATE
    ,POSTCODE
    ,RELIGION
    ,RESPAYINT
    ,RES_CODE
    --,RES_FNAME
    ,CASE 
		WHEN CHARINDEX('&', RES_FNAME) > 0 THEN RES_FNAME
        WHEN CHARINDEX(' and ', RES_FNAME) > 0 THEN RES_FNAME
		WHEN CHARINDEX('-', RES_FNAME) > 0 THEN RES_FNAME
        WHEN RES_FNAME LIKE ' %' AND LTRIM(RTRIM(RES_FNAME)) NOT LIKE '%[("'']%' THEN LTRIM(RES_FNAME)
        WHEN LTRIM(RTRIM(RES_FNAME)) LIKE '% %' AND LTRIM(RTRIM(RES_FNAME)) NOT LIKE '%[("'']%' THEN RES_FNAME
        WHEN RES_FNAME = '.' THEN ''
        WHEN RES_FNAME = '*' THEN ''
		ELSE (SUBSTRING(LTRIM(RES_FNAME), 1, CHARINDEX(' ', LTRIM(RES_FNAME) + ' ')))
	END AS RES_FNAME
    ,RES_REF
    ,CASE 
        WHEN LTRIM(RES_SNAME) = '.' THEN ''
        WHEN RES_FNAME = '*' THEN ''
        ELSE LTRIM(RES_SNAME)
    END AS RES_SNAME
    ,ROOM
    ,ROOMCAT
    ,ROOM_DESC
    ,ROOM_TYPE
    ,SEX
    ,STATUS
    ,TEL_NO1
    ,TEL_NO2
    ,TITLE
    ,USERDEF
    ,AUTHCODE
    ,DOUBLEINS
    ,FIRSTAWARE
    ,FIRSTVISIT
    ,REAL_FNAME
    ,REAL_SNAME
    ,REAL_TITLE
    ,SIGIND
    ,THIRDPARTY
    ,USERFIELD1
    ,USERFIELD2
    ,USERFIELD3
    ,NHSNUMBER
    ,ALTCOMMS
    ,ALTCOMMS_REF
    ,ASS_ACTBY
    ,ASS_ACTBY_REF
    ,ASS_ACTDT
    ,CONNECTION
    ,CONNECTIONDET
    ,CONNECTION_REF
    ,FUNDERREF
    ,LANGUAGE
    ,LANGUAGE_REF
    ,MOVEDINFROM
    ,MOVEDINFROM_REF
    ,PATIENTREF
    ,PICID
    ,PREVCODE
	,CASE 
		WHEN CHARINDEX('"', RES_FNAME) > 0 THEN
			LTRIM(SUBSTRING(
				RES_FNAME, 
				CHARINDEX('"',RES_FNAME, 1) + 1,
				CHARINDEX('"', RES_FNAME, CHARINDEX('"', RES_FNAME) + 1) - CHARINDEX('"', RES_FNAME) - 1))
		WHEN CHARINDEX('(', RES_FNAME) > 0 THEN
			LTRIM(SUBSTRING(
				RES_FNAME, 
				CHARINDEX('(',RES_FNAME, 1) + 1,
				CHARINDEX(')', RES_FNAME, CHARINDEX('(', RES_FNAME) + 1) - CHARINDEX('(', RES_FNAME) - 1))
		WHEN CHARINDEX('''', RES_FNAME) > 0 THEN
			LTRIM(SUBSTRING(
				RES_FNAME, 
				CHARINDEX('''',RES_FNAME, 1) + 1,
				CHARINDEX('''', RES_FNAME, CHARINDEX('''', RES_FNAME) + 1) - CHARINDEX('''', RES_FNAME) - 1))
		ELSE ''
	END AS Preferred_Name
FROM 
    dbo.RESIDENT
WHERE
    HOME_REF IN (@{variables('Home_Ref_List')})

SELECT
    Address1

    ,Address3
    ,Address4

    ,RESPAYINT
    ,RES_CODE
    --,RES_FNAME
    ,CASE 
		WHEN CHARINDEX('&', RES_FNAME) > 0 THEN RES_FNAME
        WHEN CHARINDEX(' and ', RES_FNAME) > 0 THEN RES_FNAME
		WHEN CHARINDEX('-', RES_FNAME) > 0 THEN RES_FNAME
        WHEN RES_FNAME LIKE ' %' AND LTRIM(RTRIM(RES_FNAME)) NOT LIKE '%[("'']%' THEN LTRIM(RES_FNAME)
        WHEN LTRIM(RTRIM(RES_FNAME)) LIKE '% %' AND LTRIM(RTRIM(RES_FNAME)) NOT LIKE '%[("'']%' THEN RES_FNAME
        WHEN RES_FNAME = '.' THEN ''
        WHEN RES_FNAME = '*' THEN ''
		ELSE (SUBSTRING(LTRIM(RES_FNAME), 1, CHARINDEX(' ', LTRIM(RES_FNAME) + ' ')))
	END AS RES_FNAME
    ,RES_REF
    ,CASE 
        WHEN LTRIM(RES_SNAME) = '.' THEN ''
        WHEN RES_FNAME = '*' THEN ''
        ELSE LTRIM(RES_SNAME)
    END AS RES_SNAME
    ,ROOM
    ,ROOMCAT
    ,ROOM_DESC
    ,ROOM_TYPE
    ,SEX
    ,STATUS
    ,TEL_NO1
    ,TEL_NO2
    ,TITLE
    ,USERDEF
    ,AUTHCODE
    ,DOUBLEINS
    ,FIRSTAWARE
    ,FIRSTVISIT
    ,REAL_FNAME
    ,REAL_SNAME
    ,REAL_TITLE
    ,SIGIND
    ,THIRDPARTY
    ,USERFIELD1
    ,USERFIELD2
    ,USERFIELD3
    ,NHSNUMBER
    ,ALTCOMMS
    ,ALTCOMMS_REF
    ,ASS_ACTBY
    ,ASS_ACTBY_REF
    ,ASS_ACTDT
    ,CONNECTION
    ,CONNECTIONDET
    ,CONNECTION_REF
    ,FUNDERREF
    ,LANGUAGE
    ,LANGUAGE_REF
    ,MOVEDINFROM
    ,MOVEDINFROM_REF
    ,PATIENTREF
    ,PICID
    ,PREVCODE
	,CASE 
		WHEN CHARINDEX('"', RES_FNAME) > 0 THEN
			LTRIM(SUBSTRING(
				RES_FNAME, 
				CHARINDEX('"',RES_FNAME, 1) + 1,
				CHARINDEX('"', RES_FNAME, CHARINDEX('"', RES_FNAME) + 1) - CHARINDEX('"', RES_FNAME) - 1))
		WHEN CHARINDEX('(', RES_FNAME) > 0 THEN
			LTRIM(SUBSTRING(
				RES_FNAME, 
				CHARINDEX('(',RES_FNAME, 1) + 1,
				CHARINDEX(')', RES_FNAME, CHARINDEX('(', RES_FNAME) + 1) - CHARINDEX('(', RES_FNAME) - 1))
		WHEN CHARINDEX('''', RES_FNAME) > 0 THEN
			LTRIM(SUBSTRING(
				RES_FNAME, 
				CHARINDEX('''',RES_FNAME, 1) + 1,
				CHARINDEX('''', RES_FNAME, CHARINDEX('''', RES_FNAME) + 1) - CHARINDEX('''', RES_FNAME) - 1))
		ELSE ''
	END AS Preferred_Name
FROM 
    dbo.RESIDENT
WHERE
    HOME_REF = '@{variables('Home_Ref')}'

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT DISTINCT
	P.PRO_CODE AS profile_code,
	P.PRODESC AS profile_description,
	CALENDAR.CAL_REF AS Cal_Ref,
	CALENDAR.CAL_CODE AS calendar_code,
	CALENDAR.CAL_DESC AS calendar_description	
FROM 
	FUNDSRC_HD AS ACC

	LEFT JOIN PROFILES AS P
		ON P.PRO_REF = ACC.PRO_REF

	LEFT JOIN CONTACT_HD AS CONTACT
		ON CONTACT.CONTACT_REF = ACC.CNTA_DET_REF

	LEFT JOIN CALENDAR_HD AS CALENDAR
		ON CALENDAR.CAL_REF = ACC.CAL_REF
WHERE
	P.FSTYPE = 401

SELECT DISTINCT
    Site.SiteName
    ,Site.SiteId
    ,Calendar_Hd.Cal_Ref
    ,Calendar_Hd.Cal_code AS calendar_code
    ,Calendar_Hd.Cal_desc as calendar_description
    ,DECGrouping.Description AS calendar_grouping
    ,Calendar_Hd.Invdtoff
    ,Calendar_Hd.Invdttype
    ,Calendar_Hd.BldStartDt AS calendar_start_date
    ,Calendar_Hd.BldEndDt AS calendar_end_date
    ,Calendar_Hd.BldFreq AS frequency
    ,Calendar_Hd.BldDays AS no_of_days
    ,Calendar_Hd.ProcFlag
    ,Calendar_Hd.SiteFilter
    ,Calendar_Hd.Sched_Only
    ,Calendar_Hd.AutoProc
    ,Calendar_Hd.ProcOffset
    ,Calendar_Hd.AutoProcWarn
    ,Calendar_Hd.InvOffset
    ,Calendar_Hd.AutoInvWarn
    ,Calendar_Dt.StartDate AS period_start_date
    ,Calendar_Dt.EndDate AS period_end_date
    ,Calendar_Dt.BillDate AS period_bill_date
    ,Calendar_Dt.SSProcessDate
    ,Calendar_Dt.SSInvoiceDate
FROM 
	Calendar_Hd (NOLOCK)
    
	JOIN ChSysDec AS DECGrouping (NOLOCK)
        ON DECGrouping.Decode_Ref = Calendar_Hd.Grouping
    
	JOIN Calendar_Dt (NOLOCK)
        ON Calendar_Dt.Cal_Ref = Calendar_Hd.Cal_Ref
    
	JOIN Site (NOLOCK)
        ON Site.Site_Ref IN (
                                SELECT Site_Ref
                                FROM Site_Join (NOLOCK)
                                WHERE Site_Join.LinkKey = Calendar_Hd.Cal_Ref
                                      AND upper(Site_Join.LinkTable) = 'CALENDAR_HD'
                            )
           OR Calendar_Hd.SiteFilter = 0
WHERE 
	Calendar_Hd.Cal_Code
    BETWEEN '      ' AND 'ZZZZZZ'
    AND Calendar_Dt.StartDate
    BETWEEN '17530101' AND '20991212'
    AND Calendar_Dt.EndDate
    BETWEEN '17530101' AND '20991212'
    AND (
            Calendar_Dt.BillDate
    BETWEEN '17530101' AND '20991212'
            OR Calendar_Dt.BillDate IS NULL
        )
    AND Site.SITEID IN (
	071,
	072,
	073,
	074,
	075,
	078,
	079,
	086,
	089,
	088,
	091,
	092,
	090,
	095,
	096,
	097,
	098,
	099,
	100,
	101,
	102,
	103,
	104,
	105,
	106,
	107,
	108,
	109,
	110,
	111,
	112,
	113,
	114,
	115,
	116,
	117,
	118,
	119,
	120,
	121,
	122,
	123,
	127,
	128
	)
ORDER BY 
	Calendar_Hd.Cal_code

SELECT 
    H.HOME_REF
    ,SiteName
    --,Cal.SiteId
    ,Cal_Ref
    ,calendar_code
    ,calendar_description
    ,calendar_grouping
    --,Invdtoff
    --,Invdttype
    ,calendar_start_date
    ,calendar_end_date
    ,frequency
    ,no_of_days
    ,ProcFlag
    ,SiteFilter
    ,Sched_Only
    --,AutoProc
    --,ProcOffset
    --,AutoProcWarn
    --,InvOffset
    --,AutoInvWarn
    ,period_start_date
    ,period_end_date
    ,period_bill_date
    ,SSProcessDate
    ,SSInvoiceDate
FROM 
    dbo.Calendars AS Cal

    LEFT JOIN dbo.ColdHarbourHomeID AS H
        ON H.SITEID = Cal.SiteID

sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT	 
	'@{variables('Home_Ref')}' AS HOME_REF,
	Site.SiteId AS siteid,
	Site.SiteName as sitename, 
	RESIDENT.RES_CODE as resident_no,
	InvPosting.account_No, 
	InvPosting.Cre_DateT AS created_date, 
	InvPosting.Inv_Date AS transaction_date,
	CASE 
		WHEN InvPosting.Tran_Type = 'U' THEN 'Receipt'
		WHEN InvPosting.Tran_Type = 'I' THEN 'Invoice'
		WHEN InvPosting.Tran_Type = 'C' THEN 'Credit'
		WHEN InvPosting.Tran_Type = 'J' THEN 'Adjustment'
		ELSE ''
	END AS transaction_type,
	InvPosting.Ref1 AS transaction_ref1, 
	InvPosting.Ref2 AS transaction_ref2, 
	InvPosting.Value AS transaction_value, 
	InvPosting.Balance AS transaction_balance, 
	Memo,
	USERCOMM AS UserComment
FROM		 
	InvPosting (NOLOCK) 
	
	JOIN Site (NOLOCK) 
		ON Site.Site_Ref = InvPosting.Site_Ref

	LEFT JOIN RESIDENT (NOLOCK)
		ON RESIDENT.RES_REF = INVPOSTING.RES_REF
WHERE	
	InvPosting.Site_Ref  = '@{variables('SITE_REF')}'
SELECT HOME_REF, HomeName, SITE_REF FROM ColdHarbourHomeID WHERE HOME_REF = '@{variables('Home_Ref')}'
